name: Living Hair
summary: You can instantly grow or shrink your hair, eyebrows, beard, or mustache by up to several feet and manipulate your hair for use as a weapon, though your control isn't fine enough for more dexterous tasks.
description:
You can instantly grow or shrink your hair, eyebrows, beard, or mustache by up to several feet and manipulate your hair for use as a weapon, though your control isn't fine enough for more dexterous tasks. You gain a hair unarmed attack that deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage; is in the brawling group; and has the agile, disarm, finesse, trip, and unarmed traits.Living Hair Leads To...

Demon's Hair, Syu Tak-Nwa's Deadly Hair, Syu Tak-Nwa's Hexed Locks, Syu Tak-Nwa's Skillful Tresses
